corpname.subordinate_name: Working group on Security and Safety

did.unittitle: Working group on Security and Safety (University of Michigan) records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: The Working Group on Security and Safety (2000-2001) was created to conduct a University-wide review of international travel safety guidelines and procedures in effect across campus and to recommend a set of University-level guidelines for international travelers affiliated with the University of Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Minutes, correspondence, and report of the Working Group on Security and Safety.
